title: Kevin Smith | Seth Holds a Surprise Inspection of His Monologue Writers in September
description:
Seth checks in with his monologue writers and holds a surprise inspection to review the quality of their jokes.

Then, Kevin Smith talks about his quintessential New York moment and challenges Seth to a 12 Days of Christmas-inspired impressions bit.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
